## AggConfig.toSerializedFieldFormat() method

Returns a serialized field format for the field used in this agg. This can be passed to fieldFormats.deserialize to get the field format instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toSerializedFieldFormat(): {} | Ensure<SerializedFieldFormat<SerializableState>, SerializableState>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{} | Ensure<SerializedFieldFormat<SerializableState>, SerializableState>`
